GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object representation of an article given an id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the vote count of an article by some amount

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Increments the vote count of a comment by some amount
